verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah war אֲרֻכָּ֔ה <S%H752><s%> 'a-ruk-Kah, Now there was long בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> bein between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit between the house שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and the house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid but David הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech waxed וְחָזֵ֔ק <S%H2390><s%> ve-cha-Zek, stronger וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit and the house שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul of Saul הֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> ho-le-Chim waxed וְדַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1800><s%> ve-dal-Lim. weaker ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּלְדוּ vai-ye-le-du כוַיִּוָּלְד֧וּ <S%H3205><s%> vai-yiv-val-Du bear קלְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid And unto David בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim were sons בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron; in Hebron וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בְכוֹרוֹ֙ <S%H1060><s%> ve-cho-Ro and his firstborn אַמְנ֔וֹן <S%H550><s%> am-Non, was Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֖עַם <S%H293><s%> la-'a-chi-No-'am of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽת׃ <S%H3159><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Lit. the Jezreelitess

וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <S%H4932><s%> u-mish-Ne-hu And his second כִלְאָ֔ב <S%H3609><s%> chil-'Av, Chileab; לַאֲבִיגֵל la-'a-vi-gel כלַאֲֽבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> la-'a-vi-Ga-yil Abigal קאֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife נָבָ֣ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val of Nabal הַֽכַּרְמְלִ֑י <S%H3761><s%> hak-kar-me-Li; the Carmelite וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shi and the third אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H53><s%> av-sha-Lom Absalom בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah, of Maacah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <S%H8526><s%> tal-Mai of Talmai מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king גְּשֽׁוּר׃ <S%H1650><s%> ge-Shur. of Geshur

וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> ve-ha-re-vi-'I And the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֣ה <S%H138><s%> 'a-do-ni-Yah Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חַגִּ֑ית <S%H2294><s%> chag-Git; of Haggith וְהַחֲמִישִׁ֖י <S%H2549><s%> ve-ha-cha-mi-Shi and the fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah Shephatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲבִיטָֽל׃ <S%H37><s%> 'a-vi-Tal. of Abital

וְהַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <S%H8345><s%> ve-hash-shish-Shi And the sixth יִתְרְעָ֔ם <S%H3507><s%> yit-re-'Am, Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5698><s%> le-'eg-Lah by Eglah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David's אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These יֻלְּד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> yul-le-Du These were born לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid to David בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron. in Hebron פ Peh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בִּֽהְיוֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> bih-yOt came הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, And it came to pass while there was war בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> bein between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit between the house שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and the house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וְאַבְנֵ֛ר <S%H74><s%> ve-'av-Ner that Abner הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came מִתְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> mit-chaz-Zek made himself strong בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit for the house שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. of Saul

וּלְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> u-le-sha-'Ul And Saul פִּלֶ֔גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> pi-Le-gesh, had a concubine וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mah whose name רִצְפָּ֣ה <S%H7532><s%> ritz-Pah [was] Rizpah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- the daughter אַיָּ֑ה <S%H345><s%> 'ai-Yah; of Aiah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and [Ishbosheth] said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְנֵ֔ר <S%H74><s%> 'av-Ner, to Abner מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why בָּ֖אתָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-tah Wherefore hast thou gone in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- had a פִּילֶ֥גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> pi-Le-gesh concubine אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi. unto my father's

וַיִּחַר֩ <S%H2734><s%> vai-yi-Char wroth לְאַבְנֵ֨ר <S%H74><s%> le-'av-Ner Then was Abner מְאֹ֜ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od very עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei for the words אִֽישׁ־ 'ish- בֹּ֗שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> Bo-shet, of Ishbosheth וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הֲרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh head כֶּ֥לֶב <S%H3611><s%> Ke-lev [Am] I a dog's אָנֹ֘כִי֮ <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi I אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִֽיהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah which against Judah הַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- do shew חֶ֜סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with בֵּ֣ית׀ <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul of Saul אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav to his brethren וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to מֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H4828><s%> me-re-'E-hu, and to his friends וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not הִמְצִיתִ֖ךָ <S%H4672><s%> him-tzi-Ti-cha and have not delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- thee into the hand דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וַתִּפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> vat-tif-Kod that thou chargest עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai over עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von with a fault הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah the woman הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. me to day

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- so יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh So do אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לְאַבְנֵ֔ר <S%H74><s%> le-'av-Ner, to Abner וְכֹ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> ve-Choh also יֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif and more also ל֑וֹ lo; כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, if כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' hath sworn יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh except as the LORD לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, to David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> chen this אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- even so I do לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

לְהַֽעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> le-ha-'a-Vir To translate הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chah the kingdom מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit from the house שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; of Saul וּלְהָקִ֞ים <S%H6965><s%> u-le-ha-Kim and to set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se the throne דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, of David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El over Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and over יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, and over Judah מִדָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> mid-Dan from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'. even to Beersheba

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יָכֹ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> ya-Chol And he could ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, longer לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> le-ha-Shiv not answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַבְנֵ֖ר <S%H74><s%> 'av-Ner Abner דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; a word מִיִּרְאָת֖וֹ <S%H3372><s%> mi-yir-'a-To again because he feared אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To. ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אַבְנֵ֨ר <S%H74><s%> 'av-Ner And Abner מַלְאָכִ֧ים׀ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David; תַּחַתֹו ta-cha-tov כתַּחְתָּ֥יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav Thahash קלֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor on his behalf saying לְמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> le-mi- Whose אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; common לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כָּרְתָ֤ה <S%H3772><s%> ka-re-Tah [also] Make בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-te-Cha thy league אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti, for וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold יָדִ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di with me and behold my hand עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, you לְהָסֵ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> le-ha-Sev [shall be] with thee to bring about אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. all Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, Well אֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> 'ech-Rot I will make אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit; a league אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach also דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var thing אֶחָ֡ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad with thee but one אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I שֹׁאֵ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> sho-'El I require מֵאִתְּךָ֤ <S%H854><s%> me-'it-te-Cha for לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor of thee that is לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai, my face כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei except thou first הֱבִיאֲךָ֗ <S%H935><s%> he-vi-'a-Cha, bring אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִיכַ֣ל <S%H4324><s%> mi-Chal Michal בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, Saul's בְּבֹאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'a-Cha when thou comest לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai. my face ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אִֽישׁ־ 'ish- בֹּ֥שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> Bo-shet to Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying תְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> te-Nah Deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti [me] my wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִיכַ֔ל <S%H4324><s%> mi-Chal, Michal אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom אֵרַ֣שְׂתִּי <S%H781><s%> 'e-Ras-ti which I espoused לִ֔י Li, בְּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> be-me-'Ah to me for an hundred עָרְל֥וֹת <S%H6190><s%> a-re-Lot foreskins פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אִ֣ישׁ 'ish בֹּ֔שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> Bo-shet, And Ishbosheth וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-ha and took מֵ֣עִֽם <S%H5973><s%> Me-'im with אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; her from [her] husband מֵעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from פַּלְטִיאֵ֥ל <S%H6409><s%> pal-ti-'El [even] from Phaltiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son; לוּשׁ lush כלָֽיִשׁ׃ <S%H3919><s%> La-yish. Laish ק

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אִתָּ֜הּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tah But אִישָׁ֗הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah, And her husband הָל֧וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch went וּבָכֹ֛ה <S%H1058><s%> u-va-Choh her weeping אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-ha behind עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far בַּֽחֻרִ֑ים <S%H980><s%> ba-chu-Rim; her to Bahurim וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav then אַבְנֵ֛ר <S%H74><s%> 'av-Ner Abner לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go שׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> shuv return וַיָּשֹֽׁב׃ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Sho.
